name: Real dried and pressed flower bookmarks
description: A single real dried and pressed floral bookmark ‚ú® These are made with a thin laminate and are specially heated to prevent bubbling and to help preserve the colors longer. The thin material will not crease or dent your book pages. **THESE ARE NOT PLASTIC OR RESIN!** Sizes and colors may vary, as flowers come in and out of season.These bookmarks are RANDOMLY SELECTED. Leave a note in your order if you are looking for a specific color or flower and I'll do my best to accommodate, but please be understanding that some flowers I do not use in bookmarks due to their size and flowers come and go with the seasons.Quantities 10 and over may require more than the allotted processing days, I will be in contact with you via ETSY MESSAGES if I need more time to fulfill. If you're concerned about ordering a high quantity in a quicker amount of time, send me a message :)**PLEASE NOTE: The free shipping on these bookmarks does NOT include tracking. If you would like tracking on your item please message me BEFORE buying so you can purchase shipping with tracking on your order**

name: Engaged book
description: Designed to create more comfortable reading experience holding the pages.Great gift for for any book lover, a teacher, a student, a pastor, or yourself!! Keep the pages of your book held wide open with one hand. Having a free hand for a cup of tea, coffee or something else.. They are hand made 100 % wood.Universal size üëçüèΩ

name: 3D Printed Snitch Page Holder for Harry Potter fans and book lovers
description: This Harry Potter inspired snitch page holder is here to save your thumb! If you need one bigger or smaller than what's pictured please contact me before placing your order.This page holder is printed in Polylactide (PLA), which is a renewable thermoplastic and a polymer. It is ‚Äòprocessed‚Äô from the starch of plants such as corn, sugar cane and sugar beet, making it environmentally friendly and sustainable. üôå

name: Book Holder | Page Holder | Thumb Page Holder | Book Page Holder | Thumb Book Holder | Reading Holder | Bookmark Holder | Page Mark | Gift
description: Perfect gift for the reader in your family.  Place this on your thumb or finger to comfortably keep the book or magazine open while reading.  The hole is approx .75" in diameter.  If you need a custom size (smaller or larger) please let me know in the notes section and i will adjust to that size. Page Holder is NOT dishwasher safe.  Please hand wash in warm water when needed.All items are printed in a Biodegradable and Environment friendly PLA plastic. If you are unhappy with my product, please contact me and i will take care of the issue. name: Thumb book page holder PERSONALIZED  for book lovers Read holder Thumb thing holder Reading ring Gift for readers Gift for her
description: Thumb book page holder PERSONALIZED for book lovers Read holder Thumb thing holder Reading ring Gift for readers Gift for her and hisThis PERSONALIZED thumb thing holder will be really useful for people who are very fond of reading! The main advantages of a book page holder are:1. Your fingers don`t hurt after 15 MINUTES of reading with book page holder!2. The book remains like new WITHOUT damage and dents on the spine using the reading holder!3. Read holder for reading ideally fits for both THICK and THIN books.4. You can read the book lying on the SOFA using reading ring! It is a great book accessories that can be interesting literary gifts for men and women. As well as just reader gifts.5. Thumb thing holder ideal for books with glue binding, but also suitable for all books.The book holder is perfectly polished, so you will be pleased to hold it in your hands. It is covered with protective oil from stains appearing.Book page holder will also be ideal for pupils, students, teachers, book lover. Ideal gift for readers!PLEASE WRITE YOUR TEXT AND FONT IN THE ORDER COMMENTS!If you do not specify the font in the comment, then the holder will be engraved with the MAIN FONT #1!100% handmade! Simply. Unusual. Gift idea. Small thing for your convenience and the convenience of your loved ones.Wood:1. Beech2. Walnut3. PadoukBuy book holder from the shop by adding it to the cart and following a simple checkout process and in a few weeks it will be in your hands. You get a beautiful handmade product at a reasonable price.-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-HOW TO ORDER FROM ETSY?Step 1: Add an item to your cart.Step 2: Add order details.Step 3: Select payment method.Step 4: Submit your order.-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-If you are interested in wholesale order, then write to us and we will discuss the discount.Attention: as the texture and tone of each wood are unique, you will get a very similar holder like in the photo.
